Wisdom: إِيَّاكَ وَمُعَاشَرَةَ الْأَشْرَارِ فَإِنَّهُمْ كَالنَّارِ مُبَاشَرَتُهَا تُحْرِقُ
enWisdom: Keep away from socializing with evil people for they are like fire the one who comes in contact with it gets burnt

Wisdom: إِيَّاكَ وَمُصَاحَبَةَ الْأَشْرَارِ فَإِنَّهُمْ يَمُنُّونَ [يمشون‏] عَلَيْكَ بِالسَّلَامَةِ مِنْهُمْ
enWisdom: Be careful not to accompany the wicked, for they consider it a favour upon you to keep you safe from themselves

Wisdom: أَسْرَعُ الْمَوَدَّاتِ انْقِطَاعاً مَوَدَّاتُ الْأَشْرَارِ
enWisdom: The quickest friendships to get cut off are the friendships of wicked people

Wisdom: جَلِيسُ الشَّرِّ نَقِمَةٌ
enWisdom: An evil companion is a curse

Wisdom: جَانِبُوا الْأَشْرَارَ وَجَالِسُوا الْأَخْيَارَ
enWisdom: Keep away from the wicked and sit in the company the virtuous

Wisdom: صُحْبَةُ الْأَشْرَارِ تَكْسِبُ الشَّرَّ كَالرِّيحِ إِذَا مَرَّتْ بِالنَّتْنِ حَمَلَتْ نَتْناً
enWisdom: Association with the wicked leads one to become evil, just like the wind when it passes by a foul smell, it carries the stench

Wisdom: صُحْبَةُ الْأَشْرَارِ تُوجِبُ سُوءَ الظَّنِّ بِالْأَخْيَارِ
enWisdom: Association with the wicked leads one to have negative thoughts about the righteous

Wisdom: عَادَةُ الْأَشْرَارِ أَذِيَّةُ الرِّفَاقِ
enWisdom: It is the habit of the wicked to trouble [their] friends

Wisdom: لَيْسَ مَنْ خَالَطَ الْأَشْرَارَ بِذِي مَعْقُولٍ
enWisdom: For everything there is a vexation and the vexation of your lifetime is [being in] the company of an enemy

Wisdom: مَنْ صَحِبَ الْأَشْرَارَ لَمْ يَسْلَمْ
enWisdom: One who spoils [his relationship with] his friend has reduced his own number

Wisdom: مَنْ كَثُرَ شَرُّهُ لَمْ يَأْمَنْهُ مُصَاحِبُهُ
enWisdom: One whose evil is too much, [even] his companion is not safe from him

Wisdom: مِنْ سُوءِ الِاخْتِيَارِ صُحْبَةُ الْأَشْرَارِ
enWisdom: One who calls you towards the Eternal Abode and assists you to work for it, then he is indeed a caring friend

Wisdom: مُصَاحَبَةُ الْأَشْرَارِ تُوجِبُ التَّلَفَ
enWisdom: Accompanying the wicked brings ruin

Wisdom: مُصَاحِبُ الْأَشْرَارِ كَرَاكِبِ الْبَحْرِ إِنْ سَلِمَ مِنَ الْغَرَقِ لَمْ يَسْلَمْ مِنَ الْفَرَقِ
enWisdom: One who accompanies the wicked is like one who travels by sea, if he is saved from

Wisdom: لَا يَأْمَنُ مُجَالِسُو الْأَشْرَارِ غَوَائِلَ الْبَلَاءِ
enWisdom: Those who sit in the company of the wicked are not safe from the calamities of tribulation

Wisdom: يَنْبَغِي لِمَنْ عَرَفَ الْأَشْرَارَ أَنْ يَعْتَزِلَهُمْ
enWisdom: It behooves the one who recognizes the wicked to disassociate himself from them

Wisdom: مُصَاحِبُ اللُّؤْمِ مَذْمُومٌ
enWisdom: The one who accompanies vileness is censured

Wisdom: لَا تُكْثِرَنَّ [من‏] صُحْبَةَ اللَّئِيمِ فَإِنَّهُ إِنْ صَحِبَتْكَ نِعْمَةٌ حَسَدَكَ وَإِنْ طَرَقَتْكَ نَائِبَةٌ قَذَفَكَ
enWisdom: Do not frequent the company of a wicked person, for if you are bestowed with a blessing, he will envy you and if a misfortune befalls you, he will abandon you

Wisdom: احْذَرِ الشَّرِيرَ عِنْدَ إِقْبَالِ الدَّوْلَةِ لِئَلَّا يُزِيلَهَا عَنْكَ وَعِنْدَ إِدْبَارِهَا لِئَلَّا يُعِينَ عَلَيْكَ
enWisdom: Be wary of the wicked one during the coming of power [and authority], that he does not cause it to be taken away from you and during its departure [from you], that he does not gather support against you

Wisdom: قَطِيعَةُ الْفَاجِرِ غُنْمٌ
enWisdom: The cutting off ties with an immoral person is a gain

Wisdom: كُنْ بِالْوَحْدَةِ آنَسَ مِنْكَ بِقُرَنَاءِ السَّوْءِ
enWisdom: Do not acquire more ‘worldly’ brothers, for if you become incapable of fulfilling their wishes they turn into enemies; and their example is like the example of fire – a lot of it burns and a little of it benefits

Wisdom: وَحْدَةُ الْمَرْءِ خَيْرٌ لَهُ مِنْ قَرِينِ السَّوْءِ
enWisdom: Sitting in the company of wise men enlivens the minds and cures the souls

Wisdom: لِكُلِّ شَيْ‏ءٍ آفَةٌ وَآفَةُ الْخَيْرِ قَرِينُ السَّوْءِ
enWisdom: The bane of goodness is an evil companion

Wisdom: مِنْ عَلَامَاتِ الْإِدْبَارِ مُقَارَنَةُ الْأَرْذَالِ
enWisdom: From the signs of turning backward is accompanying the vile

Wisdom: مَا فِرَارُ الْكِرَامِ مِنَ الْحِمَامِ كَفِرَارِهِمْ مِنَ الْبُخْلِ وَمُقَارَنَةِ اللِّئَامِ
enWisdom: The honourable do not flee from death the way they flee from stinginess and the company of the wicked

Wisdom: يُبْتَلَى مُخَالِطُ النَّاسِ بِقَرِينِ السَّوْءِ وَمُدَاجَاةِ الْعَدُوّ
enWisdom: The one who mingles with people is afflicted by the evil associate and the hypocrisy of the enemy
